section.title: Test Campaign Details
section.p: Complete the fields below, entering the details of the test campaign to be created

section.title: Name
section.p: Enter a name that identifies the test campaign.

section.title: Product, Drop, Feature and Components
section.p: Set the product, drop, feature and components relevant to the test campaign.
Note that drop and components are only applicable for certain products.

section.title: PS-From
section.p: Depending upon the drop which is selected,required ISO's should be given here.

section.title: PS-To
section.p: Depending upon the drop which is selected,required ISO's should be given here.

section.title: Guide Revision
section.p: Required Guide Revision should be given here.

section.title: SED Revision
section.p: Required SED Revision should be given here.

section.title: Other Dependent SW
section.p: Required Other Dependent SW should be given here.

section.title: Node Type and Version
section.p: Required Node Type and Version should be given here.

section.title: Comment
section.p: Required Comment should be given here.

section.title: SoV Status
section.p: Required Sov status should be given here. (Recommended values are Compliant, Non Compliant, Partially Compliant)

section.title: Description
section.p: Describe the purpose of the test campaign.

section.title: Release
section.p: The version of the product the test campaign is applicable for. E.g ENM 15B, OSSRC 14

section.title: Environment
section.p: An environment containing hardware, instrumentation, simulators, software tools, and other support elements needed to conduct a test.

section.title: Test Cases
section.p: This table lists the test cases to be added to the test campaign. Use the widget below to add one or many test cases to this test campaign.
Table results can be filtered by entering a search term in the filter box at the top of each column. Filter options are: '=': equal to, '!=': not equal to, and '~': contains

section.title: Add Test Cases
section.p: Enter a test case id in the text box and select the required test case from the dropdown list. Clicking 'Add', adds this test case to the table below.
In order for autocomplete to find the test case ID please ensure that both product and feature have been selected.
To add multiple test cases in bulk, click the 'Add Multiple' link.

section.title: Test Cases Table Links
section.p: 'Assign to user': Select one or multiple test cases from the table below, and assign them to a user. Assigned test cases are added to the user's TMS inbox and an email notification is also sent to the assignee. Users can also be unassigned using this command.
'Update Version': Updates selected test cases to the latest version of that test case.

section.title: Test Campaign Group
section.p: This is an optional field to allow users to group test campaigns together in the test campaign group section.
